meanings.definition: The quality or state of being grey.
meanings.sent1: The greyness of the sky made it look like a big blanket above us.
meanings.sent2: The greyness of the old building gave it a mysterious aura.
meanings.sent3: The greyness of the cat's fur made it blend in perfectly with the pavement.
meanings.sent4: The greyness of the situation left everyone feeling uncertain and uneasy.
meanings.sent5: The greyness of the storm clouds signaled an impending downpour.

meanings.definition: Dullness or lack of interest or excitement.
meanings.sent1: The greyness of the lecture made it hard to stay awake.
meanings.sent2: The greyness of the movie plot left the audience feeling bored.
meanings.sent3: The greyness of the party was quickly lifted when the music started playing.
meanings.sent4: The greyness of the routine was broken by a surprise visit from an old friend.
meanings.sent5: The greyness of the book's cover did not reflect the exciting story inside.
